    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Constructor method used to simply size the images and set it, also sets started to false which is used in the first frame of act() to get the player's spawn location

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void act()
      Act method gets executed every frame Checks for various methods.
      private void animateMovement(java.lang.String Direction)
      Handles animations for the character
      private void checkinput()
      Check for various player inputs escape = back to level selector these keys still need to be put into options as rn only interact is dynamic and the rest is hardcoded jumpkey = jump leftkey = moving left rightkey = moving right downkey = moving down interact = interact with object
      private boolean deathCheck()
      Simple method to check if the health has reached zero or if the player has fallen into the void
      private void standingStill()
      Checks if you're standing still and not on a ladder
      private void walkingAnim()
      Checks what animation should be played and based on that calls animateMovement with said animation

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        Player()
        Constructor method used to simply size the images and set it, also sets started to false which is used in the first frame of act() to get the player's spawn location

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Act method gets executed every frame Checks for various methods. also checks if game has started and if not it will set the startlocation for physics
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • checkinput

        private void checkinput()
        Check for various player inputs escape = back to level selector these keys still need to be put into options as rn only interact is dynamic and the rest is hardcoded jumpkey = jump leftkey = moving left rightkey = moving right downkey = moving down interact = interact with object

      • standingStill

        private void standingStill()
        Checks if you're standing still and not on a ladder

      • walkingAnim

        private void walkingAnim()
        Checks what animation should be played and based on that calls animateMovement with said animation

      • animateMovement

        private void animateMovement(java.lang.String Direction)
        Handles animations for the character
        Parameters:
        Direction - String of what direction the player is moving in to know which animations to use

      • deathCheck

        private boolean deathCheck()
        Simple method to check if the health has reached zero or if the player has fallen into the void
        Returns:
        returns true or false, true being that the player has died
